Author: rainsill
Title: Apple Applies Pricing Pressure
Content: An analysis of why the Apple Event helped improve the dominance of Apple's iPod and iPhone.

Author: thomasswift
Content: I second IShowU. Just do a fe test runs before really recording it. Check your audio levels and watch your final output size.

Author: tzury
Content: Those all are current trends, not future

Author: elad
Content: I guess that's true in most industries - women had to work much harder than men just to get their foot in the door, but eventually perceptions change - when there are enough women there to change the (mostly unconscious, I think) perception.\nI think that there's a good chance for a change here. I know very few female hackers, but they tend to be really good - I guess it takes being way above average to be able to penetrate a group that's predominantly the other gender/race/views/whatever. However, if you do have the ability, and the tenacity to survive in such hostile environment, you probably have a better-than-average chance of success.

Author: tuukkah
Content: Perhaps this forces them to tell the world more themselves.

Author: tuukkah
Content:
I didn't mean to complain about the presentation or judge their service. On the contrary, it was interesting to get a peek at it.

One good reason to date online could be that you don't like to go to bars to meet women. Perhaps it's the setting there, or the kind of people it selects, or the N clearly smaller than on the net.\n

Author: elad
Content: 31. My first startup was at 22 though.
